Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with fully equipped kitchen, safety box.

Hotel is built on the slopes of the hill in Parga. A few meters from the beach Kryoneri the main beach of Parga and 3min walk from the port town of Parga, just 100 meters from the beach, harbor, shopping streets and close roads link the village, the villa letista, make the visitor forget the car.
